meanings.definition: A file that is a part of a larger file.
meanings.sent1: I found the subfile containing only the pictures from the vacation.
meanings.sent2: The subfile was stored within the main document for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The subfile with all the dessert recipes made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a subfile in the larger book of her life.
meanings.sent5: The subfile of memories was filled with laughter and joy.

meanings.definition: To file under a main file.
meanings.sent1: Please subfile the report under the correct category.
meanings.sent2: I will subfile the documents alphabetically for better organization.
meanings.sent3: He tried to subfile the papers, but they kept slipping out of order.
meanings.sent4: She subfiled her thoughts neatly in her mind for future reference.
meanings.sent5: The librarian had to subfile the new books on the crowded shelf.
